name: A dark winter wander
description:
This is a short Christmas game for Game boy. It's about Embla and how she tries to handle the holidays and her strained relationship with her family. She's drawn into a twilight world of spirits where she undertakes a mysterious year walk, where she might get perspective on things or not.

It's up to you.

Features:

  • A game with a dark Christmas theme.
  • Visual novel!
  • Lots of choices.
  • A sweet short playtime.
  • A unique Game boy game.
  • Explore old nordic customs in your own year walk.
  • Interact with strange norse spirits.

A dark winter wander was made for Christmas 2021 in an ancient version of GB Studio.

Controls:

Arrows/WASD = Steer
Z = Start/Interact/Accept
Enter = Menu
